title: IPFighter
description:
IPFighter is an all-in-one proxy platform designed for users to efficiently manage their proxy lists, optimize bandwidth usage, boost connection speeds, and protect multiple accounts. It serves as a centralized hub for all proxy-related applications.

Key features include:
- Customizable proxy access rules
- Unlimited creation of IPv6 proxies
- Cross-device proxy sharing
- Proxy quality scoring
- Detection of IP address changes
And much more.
